results.title: Press any button
results.creator_credit: Anna Fraser, Tim Kreibig and AFTRS
results.brief_description: For Sophie, every day is full of choices… Independent person? Mother? Consumer? Woman? What will it be today? Features Lucy Bell as the woman and Lily Fraser as the little girl.

results.title: Joy
results.creator_credit: Cate Shortland, Rachel Clements and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
Thursday night. Late night shopping. Joy wants to have fun. This film follows a teenage girl as she hits the town in search of a good time. But Joy’s search for fulfillment leaves her lost and lonely at the end of the evening as we follow her to her unhappy home. By the director of ‘Somersault’ (2004). Original format 35mm/colour.
WARNING: This film contains scenes that may offend some viewers.

results.title: Into the night
results.creator_credit: Tony Krawitz, Melissa Johnston, Rachel Clements and AFTRS
results.brief_description: A lost and fragile boy new to the streets. A wary teenager just thinking about the money. A wealthy man playing out a delicate and lonely game. Over one night their lives intersect in unexpected ways, blurring the line between betrayer and betrayed.

results.title: The Watchers
results.creator_credit: Steven McGregor, Joe Weatherstone, AFTRS and Cath Moore
results.brief_description: In a world where all our desires are monitored, a teenage boy is inspired to cross the line. But The Watchers are out and they show him where his actions may lead. Cast: Wayne Pygram, Dane Sheddon, Nathaniel Dean, Wayne Blair. 35mm live action footage with digital effects created on SGI, Mac and PC. Original format 35 mm/colour.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Steven McGregor, Joe Weatherstone, AFTRS and Cath Moore

results.title: Placement
results.creator_credit: Bill Chen, Sarah Warner and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
Sometime in the future, Max lives with his only daughter, Ruby, in an apartment complex where he spends all his time working. But his life is shattered when Ruby chases her balloon off the edge and falls to the street below.
He is offered the chance to clone her and puts his strong religious beliefs aside in order to have his daughter back, but the new Ruby is not the same.

results.title: Pending
results.creator_credit: Anna Tow, Paola Garofali and AFTRS
results.brief_description: In this fantasy animation, Jasmine flees her war-torn country for the safety of the towering City of Anchors. But between her traumatic past and her hopes for a new life, Jasmine must first face a heartless Immigration Department bureaucrat and persuade him to let her stay. Original Format 35 mm/colour.

results.title: The Other son
results.creator_credit: Heng Tang, Rachel Roberts and AFTRS
results.brief_description: Vera is the meticulous wife, mother and reigning matriarch of her palatial home. She manages her domestic domain with digital clockwork precision. It is 7pm and dinner time. Her dutiful husband and beautiful son take their designated places at the table. However, the tranquillity is interrupted by the sudden appearance of an intruder threatening to shatter Vera’s utopia. Original format 35mm/colour.

Original format 35mm/colour.

results.title: Little blue
results.creator_credit: Peter Carstairs, Sarah Warner and AFTRS
results.brief_description: A jaded single mum and the son who carries her into his world of imagination. Sometimes it takes more than a bath to change the way we think.
